Posts.Content: sarmcl wrote: Longstory short---I had a biopsy done came back positive for cancer. I then was scheduled for a MRI last Friday and a lumpectomy was to be done today. Well the MRI came back and they found 2 more "suspicious" areas. They want to have those biopsied before any sort of surgery. If those are cancerous, I will then need mastectomy I am going for a second opinion next Tuesday. I am supposed be leaving for Vegas on June 4-7th. My question is what am I to do? Will doctors work with you? I am obviously not going to risk my health over a trip. But if the biopsy would even be until late next week or early the week of the 19th.....surgery wouldnt even be until end of May(based on my guessing) Would a doctor delay a surgery a week? I hate to miss my trip. Its been planned forever. And its really what I need to get my head cleared before I deal with this long--crazy journey. Dx 4/23/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 1/6 nodes, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: sarmcl wrote: So I had a second biopsy done Tuesday and came back today with results. One of two spots they were concerned about turn out also to be cancer. Doctor is recommending mastectomy with breast reconstruction(done same day) Needless to say alot to take in. They couldnt get me in to see plastic surgeon next week due to holiday--then they wanted to take me June 3rd but my husband is out of town and I want him to be there. So we set it up for June 10th...............more waiting....its driving me MAD Anyways---what I would like to know is what is average recovery time for these two surgeries done at same time. Basically I am wondering when will I be able to go back to work and do normal every day things. Dx 4/23/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 1/6 nodes, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Heartburn Deedee79 Sable

Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2008 04:19PM sarmcl wrote: I am going through something similar. I was diagnosed with breast cancer in April(I was 34) on the right side. Had a mastectomy in June with recon and just finished chemo Back in May, I noticed the left side bothering me. Very achy and sore. Was checked out and breast surgeon didnt think it was anything(I have one of the best surgeons in Cleveland). Once I started chemo, I noticed it flaring up evrytime I had treatment. Went back to surgeon and he thought it might have something to do with hormones out of wack due to chemo(Did not have period entire time on chemo and still dont)  I had mammogram 2 weeks ago and it came up clear(but last years did as well and missed the cancer on right side). So needless to say I dont trust mammograms. He does not feel any lumps nor do I. I started Tamoxifen last week and since then the pain has flared up even more. I am at my wits end. I am petrofied its cancer.  My left arm and shoulder has been aching too. I dont know if how I am sleeping at night( I sleep on left side alot since I have expander on right and a port)? Is it the Tamoxifen? Is it cancer? THis crap will drive you crazy.  Barra
